revised_title: Experiments in Tincturing Water and Changing Colors
tldr: Sir Rob Southwell shares various experiments on creating different tinctures and changing colors of water. He explains how to create red, green, and yellow colors, as well as how to change the color of rose water into high green. The experiments also cover making hands and face black with gall powder and restoring the shine of crystals. Additionally, Southwell discusses using burdock roots and vine ashes to treat hair issues.
